name: Outburst
description:
Enter the world of Outburst
Outburst is a dynamic multiplayer Top-Down game where you can choose a hero and fight with your friends in one of many diverse locations.

Characters

Characters from different worlds. Play as Assassin, Necro, Wizard, Dude From Forest, Elemental Anomaly, Zombie and many more! Each has its own skills and abilities. Whether you prefer to play tricks on people as Phantasm or destroy everything around you as Lava Golem - it’s all here.
Game Modes

Destroy everything and everyone in your sight to win a Deathmatch or Team Deathmatch game. Conquer your enemy in Domination by taking control of his lands. Use decoy to steal the magic orb and return it to your base in Capture the Orb. Enter Arena to become the best gladiator and be on the top of the rankings.

Progress

Gain experience with each game and use it to progress in your talent tree. This will allow you to obtain new abilities which will make you even stronger.

Customize your character

You are the hero so play it as you want it. Change your character appearance to suit your style. Add or draw your emblem to let your enemies know who they are fighting with.
